title: When It Seems Good, but It Isn't
itunes:summary:
Sometimes, it can look like you have a good marriage on the surface. But underneath, something is harming the foundation of your relationship. In those moments, what do you do? John, Erin and Greg discuss how to find a safe friend to talk to when your marriage is in trouble. Featuring Jeff and Cheryl Scruggs.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY

Receive the Scruggs' book "I Do Again" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2022-03-08?refcd=1324303

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/when-it-seems-good-but-it-isnt/#featured-resource-cta

Listen Anytime: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/hope-for-every-marriage-digital-product/?refcd=1324303

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
